short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces Brexit with [THE EVENT], an equally catastrophic and unmentionable disaster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Does it ever feel like you're living in some weird, dystopian version of the future?

It was probably Brexit wasn't it.

This extension will transform your browsing experience into the nightmarish, terrifying version of the future we're headed for; Brexit referred to only as [THE EVENT], too horrifying to mention by name.


In all seriousness, it replaces the word "Brexit" and related words with [THE EVENT] etc. if, like me, you're sick of reading the same bad, forced portmanteau over and over again.

Enjoy!

[Based on code from the fantastic "Milennials to Snake People" by Eric Bailey. Go download that too.]
